Date: 2024-11-25 15:52
Subject: Time to Reflect, Assess, & Recognise, Frosty's Peaceful Village, Ferragamo Opens Renovated Boutique, 2x MUSE Points on Skincare, Welcoming Craig Duncan, CH Carolina Herrera Reopens at Galleria Mall, Tryano Cyber Sale & Exclusive Offers
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0LeGc3qfCkKTg0bKwcZJMA/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0LeGc3qfCkKTg0bKwcZJMA/550634/140DE328A117AC9A6956FBC999C88818/image-2024-11-18t142836-138.jpeg> 	

Time to Reflect, Assess, and Recognise



As we approach the year-end, it’s the perfect time for self-reflection. Self-assessment enables us to pause, evaluate our contributions, and recognise our achievements. It’s about understanding where we excel, identifying areas for growth, and taking ownership of our development journey.

Are you ready to reflect on your achievements, embrace feedback, and ensure your self-assessment truly sets you up for success in performance discussions?

As we approach the year-end, it’s the perfect time for self-reflection. Self-assessment enables us to pause, evaluate our contributions, and recognise our achievements. It’s about understanding where we excel, identifying areas for growth, and taking ownership of our development journey.

Are you ready to reflect on your achievements, embrace feedback, and ensure your self-assessment truly sets you up for success in performance discussions? 

Learn more here! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252ftime-to-reflect-assess-and-recognize%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWaiLbMgvZ%252f5vChRLHq%252f0tT1J4ZB1LjLFhLE8mW8sqFLDvTR6wb1JCWG5MMhs9K1%252bTTcv3iNaVx%252flZlZBOZRWrhGhREeFCT%252ft7%252f7oIeaKXISoUpOBrr6Ttelx5SmXtM8i1by6Jr%252fpoIRkKyXh47xJ7KKF%252b53GEaQoJd7QeknTKUbajI66tfPj7BgFGhfG1bvI0VfJWlAnki1VRApnA0utTKFnNRs0L%252bvBOGf1LpHkAFou&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C57c72f39f6fa41b0aea908dd0d47928e%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681323237857461%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=o5QLSaw74S1at6Hb78MxamuIeWxAtkAcK9wviTAwRnc%3D&reserved=0>

FERRAGAMO OPENS THE RENOVATED BOUTIQUE AT THE DUBAI MALL 

Luxurious ease marks the renovated interiors concept at Ferragamo's Dubai Mall boutique showcasing women’s and men’s ready-to-wear, shoes, bags and accessories.

It is a celebration of Italian crafted excellence consisting of innovation, high design and unexpected inventive twists.

chunks.text:
DOUBLE MUSE POINTS ON SKINCARE

MUSE members including Group team members can enjoy 2x the points on skincare. Whether you’re restocking your favourites or discovering new essentials, give your skin the attention it deserves and enjoy extra rewards along the way. Offer valid on all Skincare at Faces, L'Occitane, Tryano and Elemis. Learn more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.experience-muse.com%252foffers%252fviewoffer%252fMUSE%252fen-ae%252f%253a75AqxkTKFj2yuKQVgZxHX8%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWaiLbMgvZ%252f5vChRLHq%252f0tT1J4ZB1LjLFhLE8mW8sqFLDvTR6wb1JCWG5MMhs9K1%252bTTcv3iNaVx%252flZlZBOZRWrhGhREeFCT%252ft7%252f7oIeaKXISoUpOBrr6Ttelx5SmXtM8i1by6Jr%252fpoIRkKyXh47xJ7KKF%252b53GEaQoJd7QeknTKUbajI66tfPj7BgFGhfG1bvI0VfJWlAnki1VRApnA0utTKFnNRs0L%252bvBOGf1LpHkAFou&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C57c72f39f6fa41b0aea908dd0d47928e%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681323237903203%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=G8%2BHZfFu52AtgfxI6V2fGvQa72aKhK7gaazBGaIcv4k%3D&reserved=0>

WELCOMING CRAIG DUNCAN TO THE GROUP

Craig Duncan joins as General Manager – CADF in Egypt, reporting to Isabell Hendrichs.

In his role, Craig will be taking the lead in overseeing Cairo Airport Duty Free in Egypt, where he will bring his extensive experience in the travel retail sector to drive growth and innovation.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0LeGc3qfCkKTg0bKwcZJMA/550672/80AC0D7624350641676534914F66CBD0/untitled-design-2024-11-25t125309-638.png>

CH CAROLINA HERRERA REOPENS AT GALLERIA MALL, ABU DHABI

CH Carolina Herrera reopens at Galleria Mall, Abu Dhabi!

Step into a world of timeless elegance and discover the refined style that CH Carolina Herrera is renowned for.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/0LeGc3qfCkKTg0bKwcZJMA/550669/F740DEE7B2F4531324567140C724BCAD/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-58.gif>
